definition: pot-scrubbing brush made of bamboo strips/basket (container) for chopsticks/variant of 筲[shao1]

sentences.english: Shau Kei Wan is a good place to get supplies for the hike.
sentences.chinese: 筲箕湾是徒步旅行的好地方。

sentences.english: He washed some vegetables, and put them in a bamboo basket to dry.
sentences.chinese: 他洗了一把青菜，然后将它们放在筲箕里控水。

sentences.english: Take the MTR to Shau Kei Wan station and take exit A3.
sentences.chinese: 坐地铁到筲箕湾站，然后从A3出口出。

sentences.english: East Island Animal Hospital, 256 Shau Kei Wan Road, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 东区动物医院，香港筲箕湾道256号地下。

sentences.english: Shau Kie Wan anchorage, packed with sampans and fishing junks.
sentences.chinese: 筲箕湾渔港，舢舨和渔船靠满一岸。

sentences.english: It provides connection to connect a footbridge across Shau Kei Wan Road.
sentences.chinese: 提供連接点以接驳一条横跨筲箕湾道的行人天桥。

sentences.english: Brennan Torpedo Station of Hong Kong Museum of Coastal Defence, Shaukeiwan, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 香港海防博物馆布伦南鱼雷发射站，筲箕湾。

sentences.english: From the village bus stop you can get back to Shau Kei Wan.
sentences.chinese: 从村的公共汽车站可以去到筲箕湾。

definition: strainer (made of bamboo, wicker, or wire)
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
bamboo, rattan or wicker basket/sedan chair for mountain use (Cantonese)
a basket carried on the back
cattail bag/(old) gift of fruit or pastries (traditionally presented in a cattail bag)
well bucket/pail made of bamboo strips
